abstract: Brazil defeats United States, 24-23, in Americas Rugby Championship in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Upsets United States on Final Play
headline.main: Brazil Upsets United States in Americas Rugby Championship

snippet: Moises Duque booted the winning penalty kick on the final play to give Brazil a 24-23 upset of the United States in the Americas Rugby Championship in São Paulo.
lead_paragraph: Moises Duque booted the winning penalty kick on the final play to give Brazil a 24-23 upset of the United States in the Americas Rugby Championship in São Paulo.
